remarks: Distribution of existential quantifiers, with a bound-variable hypothesis saying that ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` , but ` x ` can be free in ` ph ` (and there is no distinct variable condition on ` x ` and ` y ` ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 14-May-2018.)
statement:
exdistrf.1 $e |- ( -. A. x x = y -> F/ y ph ) $.
exdistrf $p |- ( E. x E. y ( ph /\ ps ) -> E. x ( ph /\ E. y ps ) ) $.
